notes: Comprehensive review application deployed and ready for manual review. Fixed all display formatting issues: prices now show as $10.00 (2 decimals), publication dates show as 4-digit years only, enhanced descriptions show coherent text instead of JSON, review notes field is empty for instructions. Added reviewed_at column to database. All 808 records loaded with realistic pricing ($10-100 range, average $24.38). Ready for manual review decisions.
